testcase.name: Validate that user is able to drag and drop Standard Blocks on Template Editor
testcase.system-out: Given User is at Unific Login Page..........................................passed When User Enters valid Email and Password...................................passed And User Clicks on Login....................................................passed Then User is successfully Logged In.........................................passed When User clicks on Newcampaign.............................................passed And User clicks on Create new campaign from scratch.........................passed Then User is navigated to CampaignCreation Page.............................passed When User enters Campaign title as "Test Campaign Title"....................passed And User selects Starting Trigger as "Order Confirmation Event".............passed And User selects Action as "Send Email".....................................passed And User enters Subject Line as "Order123" and Pre header as "{{order_id}}".passed And User edits Email........................................................passed And User clears Template....................................................passed And User drags Standard blocks on the Template Canvas.......................passed Then User is able to validate the blocks on Template Canvas.................passed
